name: Sloopy the Microkiller
description:
SLOOPY THE MICROKILLER

This frog assassins has the task of eliminating and killing these 5 humans that had committed unforgivable crimes. Use this microkiller to complete the missions, introduce yourself wherever you can and climb deeper inside to the heart. Use your knife to destroy the human and your jump abilities to destroy the enemies you will encounter.

Be careful soldier, good luck.

Every level is procedural generated, and of course, it will increase the difficulty in each level you complete. If you succeed in completing all the missions, you can restart the game and try all different paths and intersections.

CONTROLS
  • Automatic movement, you only need to jump with “Space”, “W”, “Up Arrow” or “Left Click” on the mouse.
  • You have double jump, except if you jump on an enemy to kill it.
  • You also can stay and bounce on walls.
